title: GasPrices
description: It was a project with which I graduated as an engineer, it was done for the company gasosur which consists of showing the gasoline prices for the state of Guerrero using the data provided by the government portal.

title: QRUD
description: It was a project with which I graduated as an engineer, was made for the company gasosur which consists in the registration of users and then use their information to generate a QR code which after being scanned recognizes the user information and displays their data on a form to subsequently perform the billing process.

title: ShadowStore
description: It was a project with which I made my first steps with the Angular framework, I learned the basics needed to perform the interactions of a crud using JavaScript arrays as a base.

title: Frontend Store
description: It was a project with which I learned how to do layout in HTML and native CSS, using GRID properties to build the design of a store selling products.

title: Shadow Technology
description: It was a project with which I reinforced my knowledge in layout using the css framework known as Tailwind based on utility classes to create the different elements that make up the site.
